greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Smallest multiple of n using only digits 0 and 2.
comment: a(n) = min{A169965(k): k > 1 and A169965(k) mod n = 0}. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jan 10 2012
link: Reinhard Zumkeller and Chai Wah Wu, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..9998 First 998 terms from Reinhard Zumkeller.
formula: a(n) < 10^n / (0.45 n). - _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Jan 09 2012
program: a078241 n = head [x | x <- tail a169965_list, mod x n == 0]
results.author: _Amarnath Murthy_, Nov 23 2002
